name: Power Ninja - arcade platformer
description:
Power Ninja runs automatically, you control him by clicking, he can jump, wall-slide, wall-jump and Glide.
Enjoy 96 fun levels with 6 different Boss battles.

Do you love king of thieves, Gravity Duck, Mickey Shorts then you should try this game, you will like it.

Features:
- One Button Gameplay.
- Unique 96 levels.
- 6 different Bosses
